headline: Show HN: A browser extension that places similar tabs and bookmarks together
description:
Follow the title link for more details.

Install.

Chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tochunka-smart-tab...

Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/uk/firefox/addon/tochunka-smart-t...

Safari: does not support tab(https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Add-ons/Web...) nor bookmark move(https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Add-ons/Web...). So, no extension for it. :(
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 一个浏览器扩展，将类似的标签和书签放在一起
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 一個瀏覽器擴展，將類似的標籤和書籤放在一起
